remarks: An atom is covered by a height-2 element (1-dimensional line). (Contributed by NM, 3-May-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2dim.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2dim.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
2dim.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
1dimN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> E. q e. A P C ( P .\/ q ) ) $.
$d .\/ q $.
$d A q $.
$d K q $.
$d P q $.
